description: The rocket attack, the latest in a series that struck the area in recent days, caused a massive fire and severe damage to property near the blast zone.
maintext:
A 25-year-old was being treated after being injured by shrapnel while a 40-year-old was lightly hurt in the blast.
Both were being moved to the Ziv Hospital in Safed, according to the MDA.
Kiryat Shmona has mostly been evacuated after being repeatedly targeted by both Hamas and Hezbollah since the start of Israel's war on the Palestinian fundamentalist group.
Following the rocket strike, the local government asked the remaining Kiryat Shmona residents to stay in their shelters because of a possible drone infiltration into the area.
The attack came as tensions at Israel's southern border continue to escalate, with Israeli Defense Forces (IDF) carrying out a series of air raids in border-adjacent areas to strike Hezbollah targets
title: Rocket fired from Lebanon lands in Israel, causing huge explosion as war in Gaza rages
